org.magnos.asset.server
Interface AssetServer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseAssetServer, MulticastServer, SslServer, TcpServer, UdpServer
public interface AssetServer

A server which handles requested assets.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 void add(AssetServerListener listener)
          Adds the AssetServerListener to this AssetServer.
 void clear()
          Removes all AssetServerListeners from this AssetServer.
 AssetSource getSource()
          Returns the AssetSource the server is using to retrieve assets.
 Thread getThread()
          Returns the thread thats running the AssetServer.
 void remove(AssetServerListener listener)
          Removes the given AssetServerListener from this AssetServer.
 void setSource(AssetSource source)
          Sets the AssetSource the server is using to retrieve assets.
 void start()
          Starts the server for business by binding, starting the server thread, waiting for the server to finish binding, and waiting for the server thread to finish starting.
 void stop()
          Stops the asset server.
 

Method Detail

start

void start()
           throws IOException,
                  InterruptedException
Starts the server for business by binding, starting the server thread, waiting for the server to finish binding, and waiting for the server thread to finish starting.

Throws:
IOException - Error binding server.
InterruptedException

stop

void stop()
Stops the asset server.

Throws:
IOException - An error occurred leaving the group.

getThread

Thread getThread()
Returns the thread thats running the AssetServer.

Returns:
The reference to the thread.

getSource

AssetSource getSource()
Returns the AssetSource the server is using to retrieve assets.

Returns:
The reference to the AssetSource of the server.

setSource

Sets the AssetSource the server is using to retrieve assets.

remove

Removes all AssetServerListeners from this AssetServer.
